import React, { Component } from 'react'; import CrimeServices from './crimeServices'; import { nominalTypeHack } from 'prop-types'; class CrimeDetails extends Component { state = { crime: { crime: { 'id':'', 'category_id':'', 'location_type':'', 'latitude':'', 'longitude':'', 'street_name':'', 'persistent_id':'', 'month':'' }, outcomes: [] } } async componentWillMount(){ const crime = await CrimeServices.crimeDetails(this.props.match.params.id); this.setState({ crime }) } handleEdit = () => { document.getElementById('editOutcomes').disabled = true; document.getElementById('cancel').disabled = false; document.getElementById('save').disabled = false; var buttons = document.getElementsByClassName('cancel'); for (var i = 0; i < buttons.length; i++) { buttons[i].disabled = false; } } handleCancel = () => { document.getElementById('editOutcomes').disabled = false; document.getElementById('cancel').disabled = true; document.getElementById('save').disabled = true; var buttons = document.getElementsByClassName('cancel'); for (var i = 0; i < buttons.length; i++) { buttons[i].disabled = true; } } render() { const { crime } = this.state; return (

CRIME DETAILS

OUTCOMES

{ crime.outcomes.map(outcome => ( ) )}
ID Category Month Person ID
{outcome.id} {outcome.category} {outcome.date_1} {outcome.person_id}
); } } export default CrimeDetails;
